name: Verdant Citadel
summary: Verdant Citadel is a single-level PK3 for Doom II using the GZDoom source port that was released in May 2019. It was designed by Dennis Meuwissen (Exl) and uses the music track "Cit﻿y of Ruins" and "Titan" by KhydroDjent﻿. Verdant Citadel won one of the Cacowards in 2019.
